statements: SELECT * FROM customer_segments WHERE segment_name = 'VIP';
SELECT customer_id, segment_name FROM customer_segments WHERE age_range = '18-30';
SELECT segment_name, gender FROM customer_segments WHERE gender = 'Female' ORDER BY segment_name DESC;
SELECT customer_id, age_range, gender, segment_name FROM customer_segments ORDER BY age_range ASC;
SELECT customer_id, age_range, gender FROM customer_segments WHERE age_range LIKE '%40%' AND gender = 'Male';
SELECT * FROM customer_segments WHERE gender = 'Male' ORDER BY age_range DESC;
SELECT customer_id, segment_name FROM customer_segments WHERE age_range LIKE '30%' ORDER BY segment_name ASC;
SELECT segment_name, COUNT(*) AS total_customers FROM customer_segments GROUP BY segment_name HAVING total_customers > 5;
SELECT AVG(LENGTH(segment_name)) AS avg_segment_length FROM customer_segments;

SELECT customer_id, gender, JSON_EXTRACT(purchase_history, '$.total_purchases') AS total_purchases FROM customer_segments WHERE JSON_EXTRACT(purchase_history, '$.total_purchases') > 10 ORDER BY total_purchases DESC;
SELECT * FROM targeted_audience_groups;
SELECT group_id, group_name FROM targeted_audience_groups ORDER BY group_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM customer_segments WHERE segment_type = 'demographic';
SELECT customer_id, segment_name FROM customer_segments WHERE target_group_id = 1;
SELECT segment_id, segment_name, segment_type FROM customer_segments WHERE target_group_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM targeted_audience_groups WHERE group_id = 1;
SELECT group_name, target_criteria FROM targeted_audience_groups WHERE group_name LIKE '%Tech%';
SELECT segment_name, segment_type FROM customer_segments ORDER BY segment_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM targeted_audience_groups WHERE group_name = 'Marketing' AND target_criteria LIKE '%Social%';
SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM customer_segments WHERE segment_type = 'Premium';
SELECT * FROM TargetedAudienceGroup ORDER BY group_name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM Customer WHERE group_id = 1;
SELECT id, group_name FROM TargetedAudienceGroup WHERE id > 3;
SELECT * FROM Customer WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT strategy_name, description FROM MarketingStrategy ORDER BY strategy_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM TargetedAudienceGroup;
SELECT id, group_name FROM TargetedAudienceGroup WHERE id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM Customer WHERE group_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM Customer c JOIN MarketingStrategy m ON c.group_id = m.target_group_id;
SELECT strategy_id, strategy_name, description FROM MarketingStrategy WHERE strategy_name LIKE '%Promotion%';
SELECT * FROM targeted_audience_groups;
SELECT audience_name, targeting_criteria FROM targeted_audience_groups;
SELECT segment_name, segment_description FROM customer_segments WHERE segment_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM customer_profiles ORDER BY profile_id DESC;
SELECT strategy_name FROM marketing_strategies WHERE strategy_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM targeted_audience_groups WHERE audience_id = 1;
SELECT audience_name, targeting_criteria FROM targeted_audience_groups ORDER BY audience_name DESC;
SELECT segment_name, segment_description FROM customer_segments WHERE segment_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM customer_profiles WHERE profile_data -> 'age' > 30 ORDER BY customer_id ASC;
SELECT strategy_name, strategy_description FROM marketing_strategies WHERE strategy_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, age FROM customers WHERE age > 30;
SELECT segment_name, segment_description FROM segments ORDER BY segment_name DESC;
SELECT strategy_id, strategy_name, strategy_description FROM marketing_strategies WHERE strategy_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_name LIKE 'J%' ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 3;
SELECT segment_name, segment_description FROM segments WHERE segment_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT customer_name, segment_name FROM customers c JOIN customer_segment_mapping m ON c.customer_id = m.customer_id WHERE m.segment_id = 2;

SELECT DISTINCT strategy_name, s.segment_name FROM marketing_strategies s JOIN strategy_segments_mapping m ON s.strategy_id = m.strategy_id WHERE s.strategy_id = 4 ORDER BY s.strategy_name ASC, s.strategy_description DESC;
